author: makortel
body:
This PR updates the tracking MC validation scripts by
* fix TGraph2D plotting (used in track-PV association "ROC" curves)
* fix coloring in duplicateAlgo 2D histogram
* include ByOriginalAlgo and TrackingParticle pT<0.9 plots to the set of release validation plots

Tested in 9_4_0_pre3, no changes expected in standard workflows.

@VinInn @hajohajo @ebrondol
title: Update tracking MC validation scripts
